nodes.text: HoloNet News Special Report: Journalists Across Galaxy Join Press Corps
HoloNet News Special Report: Journalists Across Galaxy Join Press Corps is the eighth video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, Holonetnews.com. It was posted on September 22, 2014.

In a HoloNet News alert, the Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle announced that the Imperial Press Corps was recruiting more journalists from across the galaxy to join the HoloNet News. He stressed that citizen reporting was the key to maintaining peace and order across the Galactic Empire. Kastle ended the broadcast by reminding citizens that vigilance was their duty and not a luxury. The broadcast carries a HoloNet News logo in the background.
